body:
Summary: this reuses the spans from the `variant` and `struct_field` (ast types) in [`expand_static_enum_body`](https://github.com/huonw/rust/commit/812ea9e169d6edcc138e334e7e2b2cb5f7ba66b3#diff-e8c08470119d6a88394bf24bb23dc4d2R902), [`summarise_struct`](https://github.com/huonw/rust/commit/812ea9e169d6edcc138e334e7e2b2cb5f7ba66b3#diff-e8c08470119d6a88394bf24bb23dc4d2R922), [`create_struct_pattern`](https://github.com/huonw/rust/commit/812ea9e169d6edcc138e334e7e2b2cb5f7ba66b3#diff-e8c08470119d6a88394bf24bb23dc4d2R993) and [`create_enum_pattern`](https://github.com/huonw/rust/commit/812ea9e169d6edcc138e334e7e2b2cb5f7ba66b3#diff-e8c08470119d6a88394bf24bb23dc4d2R1037) to create the `span` field in the [new `FieldInfo` struct](https://github.com/huonw/rust/commit/812ea9e169d6edcc138e334e7e2b2cb5f7ba66b3#diff-e8c08470119d6a88394bf24bb23dc4d2R242) (and [the `Span` parts of `StaticFields`](https://github.com/huonw/rust/commit/812ea9e169d6edcc138e334e7e2b2cb5f7ba66b3#diff-e8c08470119d6a88394bf24bb23dc4d2R256)) which can then be used "downstream" ([example](https://github.com/huonw/rust/commit/812ea9e169d6edcc138e334e7e2b2cb5f7ba66b3#diff-e8c08470119d6a88394bf24bb23dc4d2R1111)) to associate the span of the constructed `Expr`s with the fields, so any type errors get displayed as if they were caused by that field.

(Sorry for the noise with the `span` -> `trait_span`.)
